starbunclemania.glyph_desc.glyph_place_f: Place Fluid in world, draining from a tank in the hotbar or next to the turret
starbunclemania.glyph_desc.glyph_pickup_: Pickups Fluids from world and fill a tank in the hotbar or next to the turret
ars_nouveau.starbuncle.sided_item_behavi: Starbuncle will now insert/extract items from specified sides
ars_nouveau.starbuncle.energy_from: Starbuncle will take energy from this battery
ars_nouveau.starbuncle.fluid_from: Starbuncle will take fluids from this tank
ars_nouveau.starbuncle.gas_from: Starbuncle will take gas from this tank
ars_nouveau.starbuncle.trashing_items: Trashing items from ground and %d locations
starbunclemania.page.direction_scroll: Provides a face/direction to Starbuncle automations. When the scroll is used on a starbuncle or placed in an item frame on a block, the starbuncle will interact with the block from the specified face.
starbunclemania.page.fluid_scroll: Provides a filter to Starbuncle fluid automations. Works like the item counterpart, used on a starbuncle or placed in an item frame on the tank.
starbunclemania.page.fluid_jar: A tank made from cascading archwood logs that can hold up to 16 buckets of fluid. If used to store a potion fluid and a potion jar is placed above it, the fluid will be converted to the jar for flask/melding use.
starbunclemania.page.fluid_sourcelink: Consumes fluids to generate source. Will automatically drain from tanks below it if compatible.
starbunclemania.page.source_condenser: Condense the Source from Jars into a stable fluid. Will automatically output to tanks below it if possible.
starbunclemania.page.star_hat: Accessories from StarbuncleMania aren't just for the worker starbuncles to enjoy, you can use them on your starbuncle familiar too! This one doesn't do anything, but is surely stylish. Shift-clicking a starby with an accessory will only set it as cosmetic, without setting the job.
starbunclemania.page.star_battery: Allows Starbuncles to transport energy. Once wearing the accessory, use the Dominion wand to connect them between FE blocks.
starbunclemania.page.star_bucket: Allows Starbuncles to transport fluids. Once wearing the accessory, use the Dominion wand to connect them between tanks.
starbunclemania.page.star_balloon: Allows Starbuncles to transport simple gasses [Mekanism]. Can be dyed if used as cosmetic, but will use the stored gas color when used for transport. Once wearing the accessory, use the Dominion wand to connect them between gas tanks.
starbunclemania.page.wyrm_degree: Allows Starbuncles to insert/extract items from a specific side with Direction Scrolls.
starbunclemania.page.star_bin: Allows Starbuncles to embrace their inner raccoon and trash items. While wearing the accessory the Starbuncle will void any nearby item on the ground.
starbunclemania.page.star_saddle: Allows Starbuncles to transport players. While wearing the accessory, the Starbuncle becomes big enough to be rideable. [Still a bit wip, might be a bit wonky]
starbunclemania.page.wixie_cook: The Wixie can now cook! Place a Wixie on a furnace to allow it to smelt and smoke items, also compatible with a cooking pot [Farmers Delight] and crucibles [EidolonRepraised] to automate them.
starbunclemania.page.wixie_cut: Place a Wixie on a stonecutter or on a cutting board to have it use their cutting recipes for craftings.
starbunclemania.adv.title.wyrm_degree: It's also thanks to my two degrees...
starbunclemania.adv.desc.wixie_cook: Place a Wixie on a Furnace, a Crucible or a Cooking Pot
starbunclemania.adv.desc.wixie_stonework: Place a Wixie on a Stonecutter or on a Cutting Board
